definition: serving to warn, cautionary advice about something imminent (especially imminent danger or other unpleasantness)
details:
adjective
- serving to warn
= synonyms: admonitory
noun
- cautionary advice about something imminent (especially imminent danger or other unpleasantness)
= synonyms: monition
- notification of something, usually in advance
= example: notification of something, usually in advance
- a message informing of danger
= example: a message informing of danger
